name: getMultiNodeInventoryForAllSkuAndAllShipNodes
description: This API will retrieve the inventory count for all of a seller's items across all ship nodes by item to ship node mapping. Inventory can be zero or non-zero. Please note that NextCursor value changes and it needs to be passed on from the previous call to next call.

limit.description: The number of items returned. Cannot be more than 50.

nextCursor.description: String returned from initial API call to indicate pagination. Specify nextCursor value to retrieve the next 50 items.

WM_SEC.ACCESS_TOKEN.description: The access token retrieved in the Token API call

WM_CONSUMER.CHANNEL.TYPE.description: A unique ID to track the consumer request by channel. Use the Consumer Channel Type received during onboarding

WM_QOS.CORRELATION_ID.description: A unique ID which identifies each API call and used to track and debug issues; use a random generated GUID for this ID

$ul: **nextCursor**: Used for pagination to fetch the next set of items.
**totalCount**: Total number of Skus of the Seller. Example: '235'
